divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home when I noticed this flashinglight, then I noticed it wasn't moving like the rest of the planes in the sky.so I continued to watch it, it moved slowly back and fourth and stayed in the sky til wee hours of the morning. I've seen this object 5 times sense october always in the east south east sky close to atlanta.
Summary: Flashing many colors comes every week
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Tucker
There were no other sightings in Tucker on or around December 28th 2011
